metadata.name: 'Ephemera'
metadata.description:
Ephemera - things that exist or are used or enjoyed for only a short time.

The sparkling of fireflies on a summer evening reminds me of my carefree childhood days. However, these moments have nowadays been reduced to almost never occurring. This is why I made this short animation to capture this transitory moment and hopefully invoke a feeling of gratitude and nostalgia.

Animation & Music by Agniv Duarah a.k.a RenderRides.
1920x1080, 24fps.
